alert.note: Alert for Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 2:53PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Florence, west central Horry, central Marion and northeastern Williamsburg Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 252 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a couple of strong thunderstorms, 1 near Morrisville or 13 miles southeast of Kingstree, and the other near Gresham. Both moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Johnsonville, Hemingway, Galivants Ferry, Hannah, Poston, Nesmith, Brittons Neck, Indiantown, Rains, Gresham, Morrisville, Henry, Kingsburg, Aynor and Stuckey. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Horry; Florence; Marion; Northern Horry; Williamsburg
